title: Jordyn Holman On Location in Puerto Rico
itunes:title: Jordyn Holman On Location in Puerto Rico
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010Guest: Jordyn Holman discusses the current circumstances in Puerto Rico. She is on location just outside of San Juan, Puerto Rico.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
